Key Match Events: South Africa captain Temba Bavuma gave his side a solid start with a cameo.
A double century partnership between Quinton de Kock and Rassie van der Dussen set the tone for South Africa.
Rassie van der Dussen was named Player of the Match after a brilliant century.
Glenn Phillips scored 60 runs for New Zealand in a losing effort.
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa captain Temba Bavuma praised his team's clinical display with the bat and their execution with the ball.
New Zealand captain Tom Latham did not regret fielding first despite the heavy defeat.
Rassie van der Dussen reflected on the hard work required to build his century and the effective partnership with Quinton de Kock.
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand have now lost three consecutive matches and face a crucial game against Pakistan next.
South Africa moved to the top of the standings, a position India could reclaim in their next match.
